accounts.desc: TokenOwnerRecord of the voter. PDA seeds: ['governance',realm, vote_governing_token_mint, governing_token_owner]

accounts.name: governanceAuthority
accounts.desc: Governance Authority (Token Owner or Governance Delegate)

accounts.name: proposalVoteRecord
accounts.desc: Proposal VoteRecord account. PDA seeds: ['governance',proposal,token_owner_record]

accounts.name: governingTokenMint
accounts.desc:
The Governing Token Mint which is used to cast the vote (vote_governing_token_mint).
    The voting token mint is the governing_token_mint of the Proposal for Approve, Deny and Abstain votes.
    For Veto vote the voting token mint is the mint of the opposite voting population.
    Council mint to veto Community proposals and Community mint to veto Council proposals
    Note: In the current version only Council veto is supported

Council Token Mint - optional.

        After setting council to None it won't be possible to withdraw the tokens from the Realm any longer. 
        If that's required then it must be done before executing this instruction

errors.name: RealmAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Realm with the given name and governing mints already exists

errors.name: GoverningTokenOwnerMustSign
errors.msg: Governing Token Owner must sign transaction

errors.name: GoverningTokenOwnerOrDelegateMustSign
errors.msg: Governing Token Owner or Delegate  must sign transaction

errors.name: AllVotesMustBeRelinquishedToWithdrawGoverningTokens
errors.msg: All votes must be relinquished to withdraw governing tokens

errors.name: InvalidTokenOwnerRecordAccountAddress
errors.msg: Invalid Token Owner Record account address

errors.name: InvalidVoteThresholdPercentage
errors.msg: Invalid Governance config: Vote threshold percentage out of range

errors.name: ProposalAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Proposal for the given Governance, Governing Token Mint and index already exists

errors.name: VoteAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Token Owner already voted on the Proposal

errors.name: NotEnoughTokensToCreateProposal
errors.msg: Owner doesn't have enough governing tokens to create Proposal

errors.name: CannotExecuteTransactionWithinHoldUpTime
errors.msg: Can't execute transaction within its hold up time

errors.name: TransactionHoldUpTimeBelowRequiredMin
errors.msg: Transaction hold up time is below the min specified by Governance

errors.name: TransactionAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Transaction at the given index for the Proposal already exists

errors.name: CannotFinalizeVotingInProgress
errors.msg: Can't finalize vote. Voting still in progress

errors.name: InvalidGovernanceForProposal
errors.msg: Proposal does not belong to the given Governance

errors.name: InvalidGoverningMintForProposal
errors.msg: Proposal does not belong to given Governing Mint

errors.name: MintAuthorityMustSign
errors.msg: Current mint authority must sign transaction

errors.name: SplTokenInvalidMintAccountData
errors.msg: Token mint account data is invalid

errors.name: SplTokenMintNotInitialized
errors.msg: Token Mint account is not initialized

errors.name: InvalidUpgradeAuthority
errors.msg: Provided upgrade authority doesn't match current program upgrade authority

errors.name: UpgradeAuthorityMustSign
errors.msg: Current program upgrade authority must sign transaction

errors.name: TokenOwnerMustSign
errors.msg: Current token owner must sign transaction

errors.name: RealmCouncilMintChangeIsNotSupported
errors.msg: Realm council mint change is not supported

errors.name: InvalidMaxVoterWeightAbsoluteValue
errors.msg: Invalid max voter weight absolute value

errors.name: InvalidMaxVoterWeightSupplyFraction
errors.msg: Invalid max voter weight supply fraction

errors.name: NotEnoughTokensToCreateGovernance
errors.msg: Owner doesn't have enough governing tokens to create Governance

errors.name: AllProposalsMustBeFinalisedToWithdrawGoverningTokens
errors.msg: All proposals must be finalized to withdraw governing tokens

errors.name: AtLeastOneVoteThresholdRequired
errors.msg: At least one VoteThreshold is required

errors.name: CannotChangeCommunityTokenTypeToMemebership
errors.msg: Cannot change community TokenType to Memebership
